tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Thanks to Dr. Vineesha, she addressed the issues quickly. Suggestions for improvement and solution oriented approach is appreciated.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Initially, I was very apprehensive to visit a dentist due to this current Covid situation but when I visited Dr.Vineesha's Dental Clinic, as suggested by one of my friends, I was pleasantly surprised with the safety norms followed by the clinic staff. My room was completely fumigated before my entry. I, then, underwent a root canal treatment which was  completely pain-free and the best part is that my doctors talked me through the procedure and reassured me at every step of the treatment. Thanks Dr. Vineesha!
A big thumbs up to anyone who wants to visit her!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Came for a yearly checkup and some concerns. Clear diagnostics and patient explanation to all queries.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** **** ***** ** ** *** *** ** **** ****** ****** I had my wisdom tooth extracted plus a root canal.

Dr. Vinisha was fantastic on diagnosing and explains everything to ensure you get the comfort. Addresses all your questions, concerns and worries.  Very friendly and professional.

Highly recommended.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The young doctors were not only knowledgeable but also displayed great confidence in their procedure. They took time to explain the procedures which made me feel more at ease.  Their friendliness helped create a relaxed atmosphere, alleviating any dental anxiety i may have had.  It was a positive experience for me.
